InformationURL.Name: World Data Center for Cosmic Rays (WDCCR) Read_Me (Starting Point of Data Access)
InformationURL.Description: This Web page includes numerical data and plots of cosmic-ray neutron observations covering the interval from 1953 to present.

AccessURL.Name: Climax hourly intensities
AccessURL.Description: Parent directory containing compressed yearly files with naming convention "File: ClimaxYYYY" containg hourly averaged Climax neutron monitor intensity measurements for YYYY = 1951 through 2006.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: C. Lopate, University of New Hampshire

Parameter.Name: Interval Start Time
Parameter.Description: Nominal Start Time for the average given as MM/DD/YYYY HH SSSSSSSSSS where MM = month of year (01-12) DD = Day of Month (01-31) YYYY = Gregorian Year AD HH = Hour of Day (00-23) SSSSSSSSSS = Seconds since 00:00:00 Jan. 01, 1904

Parameter.Name: Climax Hourly Average
Parameter.Description: Climax pressure corrected counts per hour, prescaled by 100 Periods with no data are indicated by -1
Parameter.Caveats: For true counts per hour, the value given must be multiplied by 100.
